headline: 2025-10-28 — Energy-systems research team (ArXiv preprint) compute and set an intermediate reactive power control command expressed in VAR (reactive volt-ampere) as a reference for lower-layer controllers to align component interactions.

2025-10-29 — Energy-systems research team (ArXiv preprint) formulate control commands for lower-layer implementation using Feedback Linearizing Control (FBLC) that output voltage commands measured in volts (V) to stabilize a controllable RLC circuit representing a microgrid component.

2025-10-27 — Quadcopter research team (ArXiv preprint) apply quaternion state-feedback to compute rotor-tilt and attitude commands, producing rotor-tilt angle setpoints in degrees (°) for waypoint navigation and attitude-step tracking.

2025-10-30 — Quadcopter research team (ArXiv preprint) linearize the vehicle model about hover and derive control allocation that issues per-rotor thrust commands measured in newtons (N) for thrust-vectoring and over-actuated control allocation.
